54° Clouds

[INFORMATION](https://sainthedwigcity.com/more/index.php)
[BUDGET & TAXES](https://sainthedwigcity.com/more/budget___taxes/index.php)
PROPERTY TAX
By Resolution 2025-06-R, 8/6/2025, the Saint Hedwig City Council proposed an Ad Valorem Tax Rate of $0.495000 per $100 valuation for 2025.
[RESOLUTION 2025-06-R\_Proposed 2025 Ad Valorem Tax Rate](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2025-06-R_RESOLUTION_2025%20Proposed%20Tax%20Rate%20of%20$0.495000%20per%20$100%20valuation%20(signed).pdf?t=202508071612140)
[Notice of 2025 Calculated Tax Rates](https://sainthedwigcity.com/Notice%20of%202025%20Calculated%20Tax%20Rates.pdf?t=202508071604150)
THE CITY OF SAINT HEDWIG ADOPTED A TAX RATE THAT WILL RAISE MORE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERTATIONS THAN LAST YEAR'S TAX RATE. THE TAX RATE WILL EFFECTIVELY BE RAISED BY -0.12 PERCENT AND WILL RAISE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS ON A $100,000 HOME BY APPROXIMATELY $0.00
[Ordinance 2024-11\_Adopted 2024 Ad Valorem Tax Rate](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2024-11_ORDINANCE_Adopted%202024%20Ad%20Valorem%20Tax%20Rate%20(signed).pdf?t=202410291111000)
[Notice of Public Hearing on Tax Increase](https://sainthedwigcity.com/Notice%20of%20Public%20Hearing%20on%20Tax%20Increase.pdf?t=202508191722080)
[Public Hearing Notice (Proposed Budget & Tax Rate)](https://sainthedwigcity.com/Public%20Hearing%20Notice%20(Prposed%20Budget%20&%20Tax%20Rate).pdf?t=202408201137220)
By Resolution 2024-08-R, 8/1/2024, the Saint Hedwig City Council proposed an Ad Valorem Tax Rate of $0.495000 per $100 valuation for 2024
[RESOLUTION 2024-08-R\_Proposed 2024 Ad Valorem Tax Rate](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2024-08-R_RESOLUTION_2024%20Proposed%20Ad%20Valorem%20Tax%20Rate%20(signed)%20WITH%20CORRECTED%20VOTER%20APPROVAL%20RATE.pdf?t=202408091619410)
[2024 Tax Rate Notice](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2024%20Tax%20Rate%20Notice_WITH%20CORRECTED%20VOTER%20APPROVAL%20RATE.pdf?t=202408091618570)
By Resolution 2023-08-R, 8/3/2023, the Saint Hedwig City Council proposed an Ad Valorem Tax Rate of $0.495000 per $100 valuation for 2023
[RESOLUTION 2023-08-R\_Proposed 2023 Ad Valorem Tax Rate](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2023-08-R_RESOLUTION_Proposed%202023%20Tax%20Rate.pdf?t=202308091516570)
[NOTICE OF MEETING TO VOTE ON 2023 TAX RATE](https://sainthedwigcity.com/PUBLICATION_Notice%20of%20Meeting%20to%20Vote%20on%202023%20Tax%20Rate.pdf?t=202308281130220)
[ORDINANCE 2023-17 Adopted 2023 Ad Valorem Tax Rate](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2023-17_ORDINANCE_2023%20Adopted%20Ad%20Valorem%20Tax%20Rate%20(signed).pdf?t=202309211508070)
By Resolution 2216, 8/4/2022, the Saint Hedwig City Council proposed an Ad Valorem Tax Rate of $0.495000 per $100 valuation for 2022
[ORDINANCE 2022-23\_Adopted 2022 Ad Valorem Tax Rate](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2022-23_ORDINANCE_2022%20Adopted%20Ad%20Valorem%20Tax%20Rate.pdf?t=202308091524010)
[RESOLUTION 2216\_Proposed 2022 Ad Valorem Tax Rate](https://sainthedwigcity.com/2216_RESOLUTION_FINAL_Proposed%202022%20Tax%20Rate%20(signed).pdf?t=202308091527220)
(Tax rates are per $100 of taxable value)
TAX YEAR 2024:      0.495000
TAX YEAR 2023:      0.495000
TAX YEAR 2022:      0.495000
TAX YEAR 2021:      0.463578
TAX YEAR 2020:      0.463578
TAX YEAR 2019:      0.430000
TAX YEAR 2018:      0.396690
TAX YEAR 2017:      0.410632
TAX YEAR 2016:      0.424091
TAX YEAR 2015:      0.443633
TAX YEAR 2005 THROUGH 2014:      0.479895
TAX YEAR 2004:      0.435756
TAX YEAR 2003:      0.443942
TAX YEAR 2002:      0.434188
TAX YEAR 2001:      0.381531
